hero.title: Welcome to GradFE
hero.description: A modern Next.js application built with Clean Architecture, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and best practices for scalable web development.

features.dropdownDescription: Choose between light, dark, and system theme modes.
features.simpleDescription: Quick toggle between light and dark modes.
features.fastDescription: Built with Next.js 15, React 19, and optimized for performance with Turbopack.
features.typeDescription: Full TypeScript support with strict type checking and excellent developer experience.
features.cleanDescription: Well-organized project structure following Clean Architecture principles.

footer.description: Building the future of web development with modern technologies and best practices.
